ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆéœ€è¦æ ‘è¿™ç§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„

1.1æ•°å­—å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼åˆ†æ

ä¼˜ç‚¹:é€šè¿‡ä¸‹æ ‡æ–¹å¼è®¿é—®å…ƒç´ ,é€Ÿåº¦å¿«,å¯¹äºæœ‰åºæ•°ç»„,è¿˜å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾æé«˜æ£€ç´¢é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚
ç¼ºç‚¹:æ£€ç´¢æˆ–è€…æ’å…¥å€¼ä¼šæ•´ä½“ç§»åŠ¨,æ•ˆç‡ä½ã€‚

ä¼˜ç‚¹:åœ¨ä¸€å®šç¨‹åº¦ä¸Šå¯¹æ•°ç»„å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼æœ‰ä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚
ç¼ºç‚¹:è¿›è¡Œæ£€ç´¢æ˜¯æ•ˆç‡ä»»ç„¶å¾ˆä½ã€‚

1.3æ•°å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼çš„åˆ†æ

èƒ½æé«˜æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨,è¯»å–æ•ˆç‡,æ¯”å¦‚åˆ©ç”¨äºŒå‰æ’åºæ ‘

/** * @Author ç§¦å®¶å¤§èƒ– * @Date 2023/3/25 21:19 * @Version 1.0 * æˆ‘äº¦æ— ä»–ï¼ŒæƒŸæ‰‹ç†Ÿå°” */public class no1 {    public static void main(String[] args) {    }}//åˆ›å»ºæ ‘class BinaryTree{private Node root;    public BinaryTree(Node root) {        this.root = root;    }    //å‰åºéå†    public void preOrder(){        if (this.root!=null){            this.root.preOrder();        }else{            System.out.println("äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œæ— æ³•ä¾¿åˆ©");        }    }    //ä¸­åºéå†å’Œååºéå†ä¸å‰åºéå†ä¸€æ ·    //å‰åºæŸ¥æ‰¾    public Node preOrderSearch(int no){        if (root!=null){            return root.preOrderSearch(no);        }else{            return null;        }    }    //ä¸­åºæŸ¥æ‰¾å’Œåç»­æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸å‰åºæŸ¥æ‰¾æ€è·¯ä¸€æ ·}//å…ˆåˆ›å»ºç»“ç‚¹class Node{private int id;private String name;private Node left;private Node right;    public Node(int id, String name) {        this.id = id;        this.name = name;    }    public int getId() {        return id;    }    public void setId(int id) {        this.id = id;    }    public String getName() {        return name;    }    public void setName(String name) {        this.name = name;    }    public Node getLeft() {        return left;    }    public void setLeft(Node left) {        this.left = left;    }    public Node getRight() {        return right;    }    public void setRight(Node right) {        this.right = right;    }    @Override    public String toString() {        return "Node{" +                "id=" + id +                ", name='" + name + '\'' +                '}';    }    //å‰åºéå†    public void preOrder(){        System.out.println(this);        //å‘å·¦éå†        if (this.left!=null){            this.left.preOrder();        }        //å‘å³éå†ï¼Œæ³¨æ„æ­¤æ—¶çš„thiså’Œå‘å·¦è¾¹éå†çš„thisæ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå€¼        if (this.right!=null){            this.right.preOrder();        }    }    //ä¸­åºéå†    public void infixOrder(){        //å‘å·¦éå†        if (this.left!=null){            this.left.preOrder();        }        System.out.println(this);        //å‘å³éå†ï¼Œæ³¨æ„æ­¤æ—¶çš„thiså’Œå‘å·¦è¾¹éå†çš„thisæ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå€¼        if (this.right!=null){            this.right.preOrder();        }    }    //ååºéå†    public void PostOrder(){        //å‘å·¦éå†        if (this.left!=null){            this.left.preOrder();        }        System.out.println(this);        //å‘å³éå†ï¼Œæ³¨æ„æ­¤æ—¶çš„thiså’Œå‘å·¦è¾¹éå†çš„thisæ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå€¼        if (this.right!=null){            this.right.preOrder();        }    }    //å‰åºéå†æŸ¥æ‰¾    public Node preOrderSearch(int no){        //å…ˆåˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯        if (this.id==no){            return this;        }        //åˆ™åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º,å¦‚æœä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™é€’å½’å‰åºæŸ¥æ‰¾        Node resNode=null;        if (this.left!=null){            resNode = this.left.preOrderSearch(no);        }        //åˆ¤æ–­åœ¨å·¦å­æ ‘æ‰¾åˆ°äº†å—        if (resNode!=null){            return resNode;        }        //åˆ™åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º,å¦‚æœä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™é€’å½’å‰åºæŸ¥æ‰¾        if (this.right!=null){            resNode = this.right.preOrderSearch(no);        }        return resNode;//æ³¨æ„ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶çš„resNodeå¯èƒ½ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¦åœ¨æ ‘å“ªé‡Œè¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­    }    //ä¸­åºéå†æŸ¥æ‰¾ï¼Œå’Œåç»­éå†æŸ¥æ‰¾å’Œå‰åºéå†æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æ€è·¯ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬éƒ½æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§å‰é¢éå†çš„æ€è·¯æŸ¥æ‰¾    public Node infixOrderSearch(int no){        Node resNode=null;        if (this.left!=null){            resNode=this.left.infixOrderSearch(no);        }        if (resNode!=null){            return resNode;        }        if (this.id==no){            return this;        }        if (this.right!=null){            resNode=this.right.infixOrderSearch(no);        }        return resNode;    }    //åç»­éå†æŸ¥æ‰¾    public Node postOrderSearch(int no){        Node resNode=null;        if (this.left!=null){            resNode=this.left.postOrderSearch(no);        }        if (resNode!=null){            return resNode;        }        if (this.right!=null){            resNode=this.right.postOrderSearch(no);        }        if (resNode!=null){            return resNode;        }        if (this.id==no){            return this;        }        return resNode;    }}

package æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸ç®—æ³•.å†’æ³¡æ’åº;import java.util.Arrays;/** * @Author ç§¦å®¶å¤§èƒ– * @Date 2022/9/20 20:25 * @Version 1.0 */public class BubbleSort {    public static void main(String[] args) {        int[] arr={3,9,-1,10,-2};        int temp;//ä¸´æ—¶å˜é‡        for (int j = 0; j < arr.length-1; j++) {            //å¦‚æœå‰é¢çš„æ•°æ¯”åé¢çš„æ•°å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢            if (arr[j]>arr[j+1]){                temp=arr[j];                arr[j]=arr[j+1];                arr[j+1]=temp;            }        }        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));        for (int j = 0; j < arr.length-1-1; j++) {            //å¦‚æœå‰é¢çš„æ•°æ¯”åé¢çš„æ•°å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢            if (arr[j]>arr[j+1]){                temp=arr[j];                arr[j]=arr[j+1];                arr[j+1]=temp;            }        }        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));        for (int j = 0; j < arr.length-1-1-1; j++) {            //å¦‚æœå‰é¢çš„æ•°æ¯”åé¢çš„æ•°å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢            if (arr[j]>arr[j+1]){                temp=arr[j];                arr[j]=arr[j+1];                arr[j+1]=temp;            }        }        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));        for (int j = 0; j < arr.length-1-1-1-1; j++) {            //å¦‚æœå‰é¢çš„æ•°æ¯”åé¢çš„æ•°å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢            if (arr[j]>arr[j+1]){                temp=arr[j];                arr[j]=arr[j+1];                arr[j+1]=temp;            }        }        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));    }}
